Text:
Why upload a pre-release version
when the final version is out ?

This is what I'm looking for but with RTM.  Everyone is obsessed with enterprise/pro AIOs, but almost everyone will have either pro or the core "home" version.  I was able to unlock the core version from pro rtm images with a ei.cfg file but haven't been able to do so with the enterprise/pro AIOs.
By the way does anyone know if the procedure for making this AIO the same as with win 7?  I made my own with 7 but not sure that the method I used will work with win 8.
